trait.name: False Appearance
text: Until a stryx speaks or opens its mouth, it is indistinguishable from a normal owl.

trait.name: Flyby
text: The stryx doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The stryx's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can cast the following spell, requiring no components:

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
text: The stryx has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Talons
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
